EmailTemplate.name: 2018 GDPR Website Implementation.Opt-In Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Honeywell E-communications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.honeywell.com/]]> You’re connected
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
You have successfully subscribed to marketing communications* from Honeywell International Inc. and its affiliates and subsidiaries (“Honeywell”), [and third parties that distribute our products and other trusted business partners]
That means you’ll be able to get exclusive updates about offerings, news and events, surveys, special offers and related topics.
Can’t wait? Check our website here <[[https://www.honeywell.com/ ]]> or Check out our latest here <[[https://www.honeywell.com/newsroom]]>
Thank you,
Team Honeywell *Marketing communications refers to communications about offerings, news and events, surveys, special offers, and related topics via telephone, email, and other forms of electronic communication (e.g., communications through social media platforms).
You can withdraw your consent from the receipt of marketing communications from Honeywell at any time by clicking here <[[https://pages1.honeywell.com/GlobalHoneywellUnsubscribe_1.html]]> © {{my.year}} Honeywell International Inc. This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future, you can unsubscribe here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2018-GDPR-Website-Implementation_Custom-Unsubscribe-page.html]]>. Terms of Use <[[http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://honeywell.com/privacy/pages/en.aspx]]> | Contact Us <[[https://www.honeywell.com/contact-us]]>
